verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> for the sons <WH1121> of Korach <WH7141>. Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> this, all ye people <WH5971>; give ear <WH238> <WH8685>, all ye inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the world <WH2465>:
Both low <WH1121> <WH120> and high <WH1121> <WH376>, rich <WH6223> and poor <WH34>, together <WH3162>.
My mouth <WH6310> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> of wisdom <WH2454>; and the meditation <WH1900> of my heart <WH3820> shall be of understanding <WH8394>.
I will incline <WH5186> <WH8686> mine ear <WH241> to a parable <WH4912>: I will open <WH6605> <WH8799> my dark saying <WH2420> upon the harp <WH3658>.
Wherefore should I fear <WH3372> <WH8799> in the days <WH3117> of evil <WH7451>, when the iniquity <WH5771> of my heels <WH6120> shall compass <WH5437> <WH8799> me about?
They that trust <WH982> <WH8802> in their wealth <WH2428>, and boast <WH1984> <WH8691> themselves in the multitude <WH7230> of their riches <WH6239>;
None of them can <WH376> by any means <WH6299> <WH8800> redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> his brother <WH251>, nor give <WH5414> <WH8799> to 'Elohim <WH430> a ransom <WH3724> for him:
(For the redemption <WH6306> of their soul <WH5315> is precious <WH3365> <WH8799>, and it ceaseht <WH2308> <WH8804> for ever <WH5769>:)
That he should still live <WH2421> <WH8799> for ever <WH5331>, and not see <WH7200> <WH8799> corruption <WH7845>.

For he seeth <WH7200> <WH8799> that wise men <WH2450> die <WH4191> <WH8799>, likewise <WH3162> the fool <WH3684> and the brutish person <WH1198> perish <WH6> <WH8799>, and leave <WH5800> <WH8804> their wealth <WH2428> to others <WH312>.

Their inward <WH7130> thought is, that their houses <WH1004> shall continue for ever <WH5769>, and their dwelling <WH4908> places to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>; they call <WH7121> <WH8804> their lands <WH127> after their own names <WH8034>.
Nevertheless man <WH120> being in honour <WH3366> abideth <WH3885> <WH8799> not: he is like <WH4911> <WH8738> the beasts <WH929> that perish <WH1820> <WH8738>.
This their way <WH1870> is their folly <WH3689>: yet their posterity <WH310> approve <WH7521> <WH8799> their sayings <WH6310>. Selah <WH5542>.

Like sheep <WH6629> they are laid <WH8371> <WH8804> in the grave <WH7585>; death <WH4194> shall feed <WH7462> <WH8799> on them; and the upright <WH3477> shall have dominion <WH7287> <WH8799> over them in the morning <WH1242>; and their beauty <WH6697> <WH8675> <WH6736> shall consume <WH1086> <WH8763> in the grave <WH7585> from their dwelling <WH2073>.
But 'Elohim <WH430> will redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315> from the power <WH3027> of the grave <WH7585>: for he shall receive <WH3947> <WH8799> me. Selah <WH5542>.
Be not thou afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> when one <WH376> is made rich <WH6238> <WH8686>, when the glory <WH3519> of his house <WH1004> is increased <WH7235> <WH8799>;
For when he dieth <WH4194> he shall carry nothing away <WH3947> <WH8799>: his glory <WH3519> shall not descend <WH3381> <WH8799> after <WH310> him.
Though while he lived <WH2416> he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> his soul <WH5315>: and men will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, when thou doest well <WH3190> <WH8686> to thyself.
He shall go <WH935> <WH8799> to the generation <WH1755> of his fathers <WH1>; they shall never <WH3808> <WH5331> see <WH7200> <WH8799> light <WH216>.
Man <WH120> that is in honour <WH3366>, and understandeth <WH995> <WH8799> not, is like <WH4911> <WH8738> the beasts <WH929> that perish <WH1820> <WH8738>.
